TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWcfReferenceReceiveContextInformation

summary.span: 定義要實作的介面，以取得其他的內容資訊。

span.span: Defines the interface to implement to obtain additional context information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此介面可讓在 WSDL 匯入工具 mechanismto 接收較佳的 proxy 產生和更好的開發人員體驗 Visual Studio 內額外的內容資訊。This interface enables the WSDL importer mechanismto receive extra context information for better proxy generation and a better developer experience inside Visual Studio. 如果 WSDL 匯入工具會實作介面，`ReceiveImportContextInformation`方法會由 WCF proxy 產生器的任何方法之前呼叫和稱為。If the WSDL importer implements the interface, the `ReceiveImportContextInformation` method will be called by the WCF proxy generator before any methods of and are called. 其他內容資訊是指要傳遞的參數`ReceiveImportContextInformation`方法。The additional context information refers to the parameters passed to the `ReceiveImportContextInformation` method. 參數包含的任何延伸模組的檔案和該物件會實作參考內容介面。The parameters include the content of any extension files and a reference to an object that implements the interface. 傳遞給方法的任何延伸模組檔案特有匯入工具，以及用來儲存任何所需的其他資訊。Any extension files passed to the method are specific to the importer and are used to store any additional information they need. 也就是 Visual Studio 不會控制這些檔案的內容，並不會直接使用它們。That is, Visual Studio does not control the content of these files and does not use them directly. > [!NOTE] > 匯入工具，請參閱 WCF 擴充性機制。Importers refer to a WCF extensibility mechanism. 這項機制可讓您自訂的方式描述服務的中繼資料 (WSDL/XSD) 文件中產生 proxy 程式碼。This mechanism enables you to customize the way proxy code is generated from metadata (WSDL/XSD) documents that describe the service. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 匯入 WCF 延伸模組的自訂中繼資料](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92310)MSDN 上。For more information, see [Importing Custom Metadata for a WCF Extension](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92310) on MSDN.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ReceiveImportContextInformation (System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,byte[]> serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReceiveImportContextInformation(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, unsigned int8[]> serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Sub ReceiveImportContextInformation (serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents As IDictionary(Of String, Byte()), serviceProvider As IServiceProvider)

public: void ReceiveImportContextInformation(System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, cli::array <System::Byte> ^> ^ serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);
abstract member ReceiveImportContextInformation : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, byte[]> * IServiceProvider -> unit

param.name: serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents
param.span: 提供與 WCF 服務參考 .svcmap 檔案相關之任何擴充檔的內容。

span.span: Provides the content of any extension files that are associated with the .svcmap file of a WCF service reference.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 向其查詢其他資訊之 Visual Studio 服務提供者的參考。

span.span: A reference to a Visual Studio service provider to be queried for additional information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents`參數提供任何與 WCF 服務參考，例如 Reference.config 或已新增透過擴充功能的自訂延伸模組檔案.svcmap 檔案相關聯的延伸模組檔案的內容。The `serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents` parameter provides the content of any extension files associated with the .svcmap file of a WCF service reference, such as Reference.config or custom extension files that have been added through extensibility. > [!NOTE] > 在 ASP.NET 建置提供者的內容中執行時，從 Visual Studio 特定的服務提供者收到的任何介面才能使用匯入擴充功能。Any interface received from the service provider that is specific to Visual Studio will not be available to an import extension when running in the context of an ASP.NET build provider. WCF 服務參考編譯的 ASP.NET 專案時，這會是大小寫。This is the case when a WCF service reference is compiled in an ASP.NET project.
